caption.title: Projected potential distribution of Phytophthora ramorum in Eastern Asia using two different niche-models.
caption.p: As modelled using CLIMEX and the composite model parameters of our model under 1961â€“1990 climate normals (a); and as generated using a Genetic Algorithm for Rule-set Production (GARP) based on known Californian occurrences and three ecological datasets by Kluza et al. [24] (b).
